name: smart4ads
tag_list: affiliate, performance, network, publishers, merchants, affiliate-program
overview:
Smart4ads is an international affiliate SEO network that provides digital marketing solutions. We deliver online business for e-merchants through CPL and CPA campaigns. We build our success on superior service to both advertisers and publishers by developing sustainable relationships.

The added value of smart4ads is based on two principles: the people and the technology. Our team consists of experts in digital marketing with a specific focus on performance marketing and e-commerce solutions. Our approach comes from the strategy consulting industry and allows us to offer comprehensive services.

Smart4ads technology finally brings the answer to one of the most pressing needs of advertisers: to take advantage of the thousands of banners and links delivered by the affiliates in order to improve merchants SEO. Our tracking technology is â€œSEO friendlyâ€ which means it considerably improves our merchants natural search rankings. Smart4ads is the only affiliate performance network that offers “SEO friendly” tracking technology. In addition, our technology is proprietary and provides advanced and innovative reporting functionalities and tools.

We operate worlwide from our head office located in Madrid, Spain.
